mapper.select: select CONCAT(province_name,city_name) from tb_province,tb_city where city_code in (select CONCAT(left(area_code,4),'00') from tb_travel where user_id=#{user_id} and TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR ,t_time,NOW()) < 168) and province_code in (select CONCAT(left(area_code,3),'000') from tb_travel where user_id=#{user_id} and TIMESTAMPDIFF(HOUR ,t_time,NOW())< 168) and left(province_code,2)=left(city_code,2);
